# B.T. Franklin: Software Architecture & AI Insights

> Curated content for AI inference, focusing on software architecture, AI technologies, and development guides.

This file highlights key, inference-ready resources from btfranklin.com.

## Essential Content

- [B.T. Franklin Homepage](https://btfranklin.info/)
- [Software Projects](https://btfranklin.info/projects.html): A curated showcase of active and archived open-source projects with detailed descriptions.
- [Guide to llms.txt](https://btfranklin.info/llms-txt.html): An explanation of the llms.txt format and its purpose.

## Cheat Sheets

- [Django CLI Commands Cheat Sheet](https://btfranklin.info/cheat-sheets/django-cli-commands.html): Quick reference for common Django command-line operations.
- [Django Project Structure Cheat Sheet](https://btfranklin.info/cheat-sheets/django-project-structure.html): A guide to organizing Django projects.
- [Django Step-by-Step Guide](https://btfranklin.info/cheat-sheets/django-step-by-step.html): A sequential walkthrough for setting up and developing with Django.

## OPTIONAL

- [My GitHub Repositories](https://github.com/btfranklin): A collection of open-source projects.
